about_the_game:
The original soundtrack for Nonorelia, composed by Ian Gottshall, a.k.a. Phoenyxcaller. Immerse yourself in 77 minutes of emotive piano melodies and trancelike soundscapes, served up hot and fresh from Ian’s parents’ basement.

Note: These tracks haven't been mastered yet. They will be replaced with the final versions sometime later (at no additional cost). We also plan to provide lossless FLAC versions, so stay tuned for updates!

More volumes will be released in the coming months as new tracks are added to the game during Early Access.
